name: Paul
title: Highly recommended
body: I recently had the pleasure of using Progreen Clean for my home cleaning needs, and I couldn't be more satisfied! From the moment I contacted them, their customer service was outstanding. They were responsive, friendly, and incredibly knowledgeable about their services. The cleaning team arrived on time and was well-prepared. They paid attention to every detail, transforming my space into a sparkling clean haven. I was particularly impressed with their eco-friendly products, which left my home smelling fresh without any harsh chemicals. What stood out the most was their commitment to customer satisfaction; they took the time to understand my specific needs and tailored their services accordingly. I truly felt valued as a customer. I highly recommend Progreen Clean to anyone looking for a reliable and thorough cleaning service.

name: Donna
title: Excellent
body: Excellent service from start to finish. I have two hard to reach windows which my previous window cleaner couldn't clean however Jamie managed to clean and I'm very happy.

name: Chris
title: Excellent
body: I needed a post construction clean after I fitted a new kitchen for my customer. ProGreen Clean was efficient and professional and was very happy and I'll be using them again thanks to all of you.

name: Amij
title: Superb service, very professional and polite at a fair price
body: Our house is over 3 floors with roof and sky lights. The ProGreen Clean team arrived on time and didn't leave a corner undone across our windows and doors. They provide an excellent service with attention to detail at the right price.

name: Ellen Finlay
title: Conservatory and window cleaning
body: My conservatory roof hadn't been cleaned in almost a decade but the results are amazing! Jamie was meticulous and took his time to make sure my conservatory and windows were immaculate and streak free! I'm so pleased â€” I'll be using ProGreen Clean again.

name: Donna
title: Whole house clean including carpets and windows
body: Highly recommended! From the first instance I couldn't fault them at all. Such lovely people and the clean was absolutely superb! Not a single spot left untouched, my windows are gleaming. I couldn't believe they managed to get them so clean. Kind regards and thank you.

name: Sophie Rowles
title: Windows look amazing
body: Great job, windows look amazing! Friendly, on time, and good value. Would definitely recommend.
